alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cherry County through 630 PM CDT/530 PM MDT/... At 551 PM CDT/451 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Merritt Reservoir, or 18 miles west of Valentine, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crookston and Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 177 and 194. Highway 97 near mile marker 125, and between mile markers 127 and 131. Highway 83 between mile markers 215 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
